requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Big Sur (11.0) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or Apple M1 chip
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics 6100 or Apple integrated graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse required
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Monterey (12.0) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Apple M1/M2 chip
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics (AMD Radeon Pro 560 or equivalent Apple Silicon GPU)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse recommended
